body: Hi again Reinier, Here is an example. It take less than a minutes on my laptop to export 1,000,000 faces. It will be probably slower than DIVA as Honeybee exports the .obj file itself which will be slower than using Rhino's export to .obj Let me know if it solves your problem. Mostapha [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ESy03VwS5ZkJwz9nWzidfQofRJpYW2U1lvkapryv1n4n2PVlMX*jiPnAyg98VoDwSS3JIPxJ8Poq-LslFhDonV9viNKpaLy-/MESH2RAD.png)
